column3:
"dn22:18.18": "Katamañca, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ? ",
  "dn22:18.19": "Yaṁ kho, bhikkhave, kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ kāyikaṁ asātaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ dukkhaṁ asātaṁ vedayitaṁ, ",
  "dn22:18.20": "idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ. ",
column7:
"dn22:18.18": "Katamañca, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ? ",
  "dn22:18.19": "Yaṁ kho, bhikkhave, kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ kāyikaṁ asātaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ dukkhaṁ asātaṁ vedayitaṁ, ",
  "dn22:18.20": "idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ. ",
column8:
"mn141:16.1": "Katamañcāvuso, dukkhaṁ? ",
  "mn141:16.2": "Yaṁ kho, āvuso, kāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ kāyikaṁ asātaṁ kāyasamphassajaṁ dukkhaṁ asātaṁ vedayitaṁ, ",
  "mn141:16.3": "idaṁ vuccatāvuso: ‘dukkhaṁ’. ",
column9:
"sn22.104:1.4": "Katamañca, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ? ",
  "sn22.104:1.5": "Pañcupādānakkhandhātissa vacanīyaṁ. ",
  "sn22.104:1.6": "Katame pañca? ",
  "sn22.104:1.7": "Seyyathidaṁ—rūpupādānakkhandho …pe… viññāṇupādānakkhandho. ",
  "sn22.104:1.8": "Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ. ",
column10:
"sn23.15:1.4": "Katamaṁ nu kho, bhante, dukkhan”ti? ",
  "sn23.15:1.5": "“Rūpaṁ kho, rādha, dukkhaṁ, vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ. ",
column11:
"sn35.152:1.6": "‘katamaṁ panāvuso, dukkhaṁ, yassa pariññāya samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’ti? ",
  "sn35.152:1.7": "Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ evaṁ byākareyyātha: ",
  "sn35.152:2.1": "‘Cakkhu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṁ; ",
  "sn35.152:2.2": "tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati. ",
  "sn35.152:2.3": "Rūpā dukkhā; ",
  "sn35.152:2.4": "tesaṁ pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati. ",
  "sn35.152:2.5": "Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dukkhaṁ; ",
  "sn35.152:2.6": "tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati. ",
  "sn35.152:2.7": "Cakkhusamphasso dukkho; ",
  "sn35.152:2.8": "tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati. ",
  "sn35.152:2.9": "Yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi dukkhaṁ; ",
  "sn35.152:2.10": "tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati …pe… ",
  "sn35.152:2.11": "jivhā dukkhā … ",
  "sn35.152:2.12": "mano dukkho; ",
  "sn35.152:2.13": "tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati … ",
  "sn35.152:2.14": "yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi dukkhaṁ; ",
  "sn35.152:2.15": "tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati. ",
  "sn35.152:2.16": "Idaṁ kho, āvuso, dukkhaṁ; ",
column12:
"sn38.14:1.2": "Katamaṁ nu kho, āvuso, dukkhan”ti? ",
  "sn38.14:1.3": "“Tisso imā, āvuso, dukkhatā. ",
  "sn38.14:1.4": "Dukkhadukkhatā, saṅkhāradukkhatā, vipariṇāmadukkhatā—",
  "sn38.14:1.5": "imā kho, āvuso, tisso dukkhatā”ti. ",
column13:
"sn35.81:2.4": "‘katamaṁ pana taṁ, āvuso, dukkhaṁ, yassa pariññāya samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’ti? ",
  "sn35.81:2.5": "Evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ evaṁ byākareyyātha: ",
  "sn35.81:2.6": "‘cakkhu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṁ, tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati. ",
  "sn35.81:2.7": "Rūpā …pe… ",
  "sn35.81:2.8": "yampidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi dukkhaṁ. ",
  "sn35.81:2.9": "Tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati …pe… ",
  "sn35.81:2.10": "mano dukkho …pe… ",
  "sn35.81:2.11": "yampidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi dukkhaṁ. ",
  "sn35.81:2.12": "Tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati. ",
  "sn35.81:2.13": "Idaṁ kho taṁ, āvuso, dukkhaṁ, tassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’ti. ",

column6:
если samudayo - возникновение, источник и тп, то samudayasañjāti в приведенной цитате это возникновение зарождения, зачатия, что не имеет смысла:   "dn12:10.6": "Yā sālavatikāya samudayasañjāti lohiccova taṁ brāhmaṇo ekako paribhuñjeyya, na aññesaṁ dadeyyā’ti. ",

https://dhamma.gift/r/?s=samudayasa%C3%B1j%C4%81ti&q=dn12#10.6
column7:
"dn12:10.6": "Yā sālavatikāya samudayasañjāti lohiccova taṁ brāhmaṇo ekako paribhuñjeyya, na aññesaṁ dadeyyā’ti. ",
  "dn12:11.6": "yā kāsikosale samudayasañjāti, rājāva taṁ pasenadi kosalo ekako paribhuñjeyya, na aññesaṁ dadeyyā’ti. ",
  "dn12:12.3": "yā sālavatikāya samudayasañjāti, lohiccova taṁ brāhmaṇo ekako paribhuñjeyya, na aññesaṁ dadeyyā’ti. ",
  "dn12:14.3": "yā kāsikosale samudayasañjāti, rājāva taṁ pasenadi kosalo ekako paribhuñjeyya, na aññesaṁ dadeyyā’ti. ",

column3:
"dn22:19.2": "Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṁ—",
  "dn22:19.3": "kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā. ",
column4: сцепливание, сцепление, цепляние, липкость, ассоциация, охота (приятное желание)
